abstract: Houston police report 6- and 11-year-old boys are killed in drive-by shooting into house where they were sleeping.
lead_paragraph: Houston police said a 6-year-old boy was killed and his 11-year-old brother was wounded before dawn Friday in a drive-by shooting into a house as they slept.

headline.main: Texas: Drive-By Gunman Kills Boy and Injures Brother
headline.print_headline: Texas: Drive-by Gunman Kills Boy and Injures Brother

snippet: Houston police said a 6-year-old boy was killed and his 11-year-old brother was wounded before dawn Friday in a drive-by shooting into a house as they slept.
